Articles.Content:
With 1.12 being the final major KSP update, it seems about time that the wiki gets updated. It feels like the majority of the wiki was written for a player on 0.25 or something. 

I've started updating a few pages, do others want to join in?

I have already done this. I actually created the Starshot-32 page. Still working on it and planning on a few others. And I am also working on the Breaking Ground DLC parts tom and making and filling pages in for them.
I do, but I can’t make an account for whatever reason
